title: Antioxidant and antibacterial activities of 5-mercapto(substitutedthio)-4-substituted-1,2,4-triazol based on nalidixic acid: A comprehensive study on its synthesis, characterization, and In silico evaluation
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Ibrahim Mhaidat, Sojoud Banidomi, Fadel Wedian, Rahaf Badarneh, Hasan Tashtoush, Waleed Almomani, Ghassab M. Al-Mazaideh, Naiyf S. Alharbi, Muthu Thiruvengadam
